mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.project_id AS "feaProjectB.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.projectcode AS "projectcode", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.vtaxrate AS "vtaxrate", a.incomerate AS "incomerate", a.umctax AS "umctax", a.surtax AS "surtax", a.legalaccfund AS "legalaccfund", a.accfund AS "accfund", a.isaccfundwsd AS "isaccfundwsd", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.yflrprop AS "yflrprop", a.isvtaxjzjt AS "isvtaxjzjt", a.issdssjsm AS "issdssjsm", a.capinvesttype AS "capinvesttype", a.capinvestprop AS "capinvestprop", a.capinvestrate AS "capinvestrate", a.industrysqrate AS "industrysqrate", a.industryshrate AS "industryshrate", a.capcostrate AS "capcostrate",
feaProjectB.project_name AS "feaProjectB.projectName"
LEFT JOIN fea_project_b feaProjectB ON feaProjectB.id = a.project_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_incomeset( id, project_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, projectcode, projectname, vtaxrate, incomerate, umctax, surtax, legalaccfund, accfund, isaccfundwsd, remarks, yflrprop, isvtaxjzjt, issdssjsm, capinvesttype, capinvestprop, capinvestrate, industrysqrate, industryshrate, capcostrate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{feaProjectB.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{vtaxrate}, #{incomerate}, #{umctax}, #{surtax}, #{legalaccfund}, #{accfund}, #{isaccfundwsd}, #{remarks}, #{yflrprop}, #{isvtaxjzjt}, #{issdssjsm}, #{capinvesttype}, #{capinvestprop}, #{capinvestrate}, #{industrysqrate}, #{industryshrate}, #{capcostrate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_incomeset SET project_id = #{feaProjectB.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, projectcode = #{projectcode}, projectname = #{projectname}, vtaxrate = #{vtaxrate}, incomerate = #{incomerate}, umctax = #{umctax}, surtax = #{surtax}, legalaccfund = #{legalaccfund}, accfund = #{accfund}, isaccfundwsd = #{isaccfundwsd}, remarks = #{remarks}, yflrprop = #{yflrprop}, isvtaxjzjt = #{isvtaxjzjt}, issdssjsm = #{issdssjsm}, capinvesttype = #{capinvesttype}, capinvestprop = #{capinvestprop}, capinvestrate = #{capinvestrate}, industrysqrate = #{industrysqrate}, industryshrate = #{industryshrate}, capcostrate = #{capcostrate} WHERE id = #{id}
